peopleAlsoAsk.title: How to ID your Bear

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How to find out how old a teddy bear is?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
The texture of the fur gives you a good indication of a teddy bear's age. The first bears were made from mohair, which is soft and comes from Angora goats. Felt was used on the bears' pads. In the 1920s, silk plush came in - then sheepskin in the 30s and 40s.
Nov 8, 2022
peopleAlsoAsk.title: A how-to guide to identifying antique teddy bears - Westland London

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How to date an old teddy bear?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Age: An antique teddy bear is typically at least 100 years old. Look for bears made before the 1920s. Materials: Antique teddy bears are often made from mohair, felt, or cotton, with glass or plastic eyes. Modern bears may use synthetic materials. Manufacturers: Check for labels or tags.
